transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello, very good afternoon. Tanya baat kar rahe Rocky ji.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir main Shailza bol rahi thi Noman ki manager IndiaMART team se. Actually aapki baat hui hogi na sir abhi Noman se main bhi video meeting mein thi abhi. To jo aapko challenge vagarah aa rahe the services mein aur aapne IndiaMART ke customer care number pe call kiya tha na sir?

Customer: Ji mam.

Executive: To abhi wo resolve ho gaya ya abhi bhi koi challenge face out kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: Wo leads ka issue tha mam dono ne bola ki thoda active vagarah rehna padega to aur koi issue nahi hai abhi.

Executive: Ji bilkul aur jo buyer ke calls hai wo bhi sir bataya hoga na aapko ki wo calls vagarah aapne kuch miss kiye hain.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: To usko bhi please ek take care kijiye kyunki non office art mein bhi call aa rahe hain. Last time bhi I hope maine aapko bataya tha ki char call aapne miss kiye the sir pure mahine mein.

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: Hai na aur July mein bhi lagbhag 18 call miss hue the July June mein 13 hue the.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Aur matlab abhi abhi to call hi khair aapko kam aayi hai aaj matlab 12 tarikh ho gayi hai sirf ek hi call aayi hai wo bhi aapne miss kar di thi. To kya sir aap call back vagarah karte hain in call numbers pe jo buyer ke calls miss ho jate hain?

Customer: Ji ji call back to karte hain.

Executive: Call back karte hain. To mujhe to yahan pe dekh nahi raha hai aur ye 665 aur 866 ye dono aap hi ke number hai ya koi employee vagarah rakha hua hai sir aapne?

Customer: Nahi ye mere number hai.

Executive: Aap hi ke number hai?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ek minute.

Executive: Theek hai main ye update kara deti hu baki leads se sir ek kaam aur kijiye ga aap ek to ye calls vagarah ka dekhiyega plus jo bhi leads ka agar aapke kaam ki nahi aa rahi hai to aapko feedback dena rehta hai to wo aap de rahe ho sir abhi?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Kaise dena hai mam feedback? Hello.

Executive: Hello. Haan jaise jahan main bata deti hu aapko jahan buyleads aati hai na sir aapko wahan right hand side mein option aata hai delete karne ka. To aap usse jab click karoge to wahan aap se reason mangega ki location ka issue tha quantity ka issue tha ya fir order value ka issue tha. Hai na same quantity aur order value same hi thing hai. Ya category ka difference hai matlab for example aap jaise deal karte ho marble slab mein ab wahan pe aa gayi Italian blue color marble slab to blue mein aap nahi deal karte hoge specification issue hai. Aap grey marble slab mein deal kar rahe ho nadi green grey marble slab hai na to wahan pe aap not element mark karoge specification mein wo daloge. To wo update karoge to automatically wo feedback wahan se aayega aur leads aapko filter out hoke hi milengi.

Executive: Theek hai aur mere khayal se abhi ye feedback to matlab aapka aaya bhi tha pehle aata tha ab bilkul hi band ho gaya matlab aana na feedback.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai madam. To abhi kaam hai na matlab abhi matlab aapne pehle September mein diya tha uske baad abhi tak koi nahi diya hai. Marble slab mein aap mainly deal kar rahe hain na location ka issue aapko zyada aa raha hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Local ki leads ja rahi hongi hai na Kishangarh vagarah ki.

Customer: Ji local ki leads aa rahi hai mam ek to dusra ye hai ki quantity wise order value bahut kam hai.

Executive: Aapka kitna minimum order value rehta hai square feet mein?

Customer: Four to 5000 minimum rehta hai mam.

Executive: Four to 5000.

Customer: Uske niche hum deal hi nahi kar sakte.

Executive: Aur wo local ka nahi hai bahar ki location ka hai na?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Dekhiye.

Executive: Theek hai main ye update kara deti hu aapka order value na har product mein ek kaam kar lenge sir main Noman ko bol deti hu har product mein na specification mein aapka order value dal denge matlab 4000 se 5000 ka order value ka. To lagbhag ye pata nahi kitni 50 slab aa jati hongi sir marble ki ya usse kam?

Customer: Kya mam?

Executive: Jo marble ki slabs rehti hai wo minimum 10 to 40 ho jati hongi na order value mein to 10 se 20 40 slab ka jo aap 4000 bol rahe hain.

Customer: 4000 mein zyada hi ho jati hai lagbhag 100 200 slab ho jati hai.

Executive: Achcha theek hai main ye update kara deti hu order value aur agar koi dikkat hogi to aap directly Noman ko call kar lena ya mere number pe call kar lena agar koi bhi services mein issue aata hai theek hai. Baki kyunki Noman available nahi the shayad aapne isliye customer care pe call kiya tha to main ye request close kar rahi thi aur aap koi feedback aayega to usse please yes reply karwa dijiyega theek hai ki aapki baat ho gayi account manager se. Okay sir theek thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with leads and buyer calls.

- Missed several calls, including non-office hours.

- Order value is low quantity wise.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the order value.

- Executive will ask Noman to add order value.

- Provided instructions on how to give feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call Noman or executive for issues.

- Customer to reply 'yes' to feedback request.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, order value, feedback, missed calls
